mapper.select: select seq_c,pseq_c,name,tel,type,progress,contract_type contractType,budget_t1 budgetT1,budget_t2 budgetT2,budget_t3 budgetT3,budget_l budgetL,budget_m1 budgetM1,budget_m2 budgetM2,area2,move_schedule moveSchedule,room,direction,option,floor,elevator,b_year bYear,context,security, bed,washing_machine,desk,drying_machine,induction,electric_range electricRange,gas_range gasRange,wordrobe,sink,shoe_rack shoeRack,refrigerator,bath_tube bathTube, security_guard securityGuard,videophone,interphone,card_key cardKey,cctv,door_security doorSecurity,window_guard windowGuard, visit_date visitDate from customer c left outer join option_customer oc on c.seq_c = oc.pseq_oc left outer join customer_visit_date cvd on cvd.pseq_cvd = c.seq_c left outer join security_customer sc on sc.pseq_sc = c.seq_c where c.seq_c = #{seqC}

select seq_c seqC,name,tel,type,progress,contract_type contractType, (select visit_date from customer_visit_date where pseq_cvd = seq_c limit 1) visitDate from customer where pseq_c = (select seq_u from user where id = #{id})

select SEQ_PFS seqPfs,PSEQ_PFS pseqPfs,B_TYPE bType,SI,GU,DONG,BUNJI,H_NUMBER hNumber,CONTRACT_TYPE contractType, BUDGET1,BUDGET2,BUDGET3,BUDGET4,BUDGET5,BUDGET6,M_COST mCost,LOAN,AREA1,AREA2,AREA3,MOVE_SCHEDULE moveSchedule, END_OF_LEASE endOfLease,ROOM,BATHROOM,DIRECTION,HEATING_SYSTEM heatingSystem,NUMBER_OF_HOUSEHOLD numberOfHousehole, PARKING,FLOOR,FLOOR_TOTAL floorTotal,B_YEAR bYear,CONTEXT from property_for_sale where pseq_pfs = (select seq_u from user where id = #{id})
